name: Siegecraft (itch)
description:
In Siegecraft,  you and a friend work to besiege a castle by firing cannons. Reduce the castle health to 0 before time runs out. Throughout your siege, you will be confronted by enemies who seek to end your assault so must be ready to fight back. Battle through 4 difficult sieges and achieve victory over your enemies! Good luck soldier!

Controls:

  • Controller:
    • Left stick: Move
    • LT: Pick-up/Throw item, interact
    • RT: Swing sword
  • Keyboard
    • WASD: Move
    • J: Pick-up/Throw item, interact
    • K: Swing sword

Crafted by: Pedro Cordero, Shiloh Light, Darren Moore, Javed Nissar, Francisco Samayoa, Ben Zhang, Chaohan Zhu
